Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1600 - 609 GRANVILLE STREET,SUITE 1600, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V7Y 1C3, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: A2Z Smart Technologies Corp. creates innovative solutions for complex challenges. A2Z's flagship product, Cust2Mate, is an advanced proven-in-use mobile self-checkout shopping cart. With its user-friendly smart algorithm, touch screen, and computer-vision system, Cust2Mate streamlines the retail shopping experience by scanning purchased products and enabling in-cart payment so that customers can simply 'pick & go', and bypass long cashier checkout lines.
